Text: RE Hi Cc I am soooo sorry I am not able to watch them for you I feel bad because I said I could I just didnt plan on all of this going on at the same time as your trip Yall are going to have a blast The th is right around the corner I got a loan through Countrywide It is a good deal because I am going with a no incomeno asset loan Basically I dont disclose any of that information I have to pay a higher rate because of it but it is the easiest way for me to qualify Especially since the down payment is not coming from my own funds But the rate isnt that bad because Countrywide will pay a point for me since I have been here over a year Its just a matter of finding the house I want I will let you know as soon as I get a signed contract Then you can come to my house warming party The truck should be here anyday now I am very excited I feel like I have waited forever You remember when I first started talking about it back in Dec of That was a year and a half ago Now I finally get it Yipppppeeee The dogs are good I took Cookie and Tyson home for Mothers Day weekend Lucy and Tyson played like crazy Mike fell in love with him He wants them both hee hee He is bringing Lucy up to Dallas soon and I get to keep her for SIX MONTHS That is going to be insane and alot of doodie too But I know she will be happy They all got along fine in San Antonio Oh and Tyson LOVES Cookie He licks her ears and eyes all the time And then she licks him back It is really cute When do I get to see you MIss you Jul John Menconi on PM Please respond to To cc Monique Sanchez Email Subject RE Hi I got back form Germany on Friday and have been trying to catch up with work before our trip to Alaska We leave this Sunday the th Moniques brother is going to watch the dogs while were gone so dont worry about it It sounds like youve got your hands full Its great youre buying a house We just cant seem to figure out what we want to do Monique is so stressed out with work right now Im not sure how much longer well be in Houston Did you get a good loan Did you get your truck yet Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Subject RE Hi Hi Worm Hows it going I havent heard from you in awhile What are the dates you are going to Alaska Did Mom tell you I am buying a house Well I am And it is stressing me out I have two offers on the table right now Both of the houses are cute I just cant decide which one I like better You need to come visit soon Hopefully I will be moved in when you bring Jake and Pearl up How is Mo How is work How are the dogs Let me know Love Jul
